name: BakuShroom
description:
ControlsP1P2 (Local)Movement:WASDArrowsPlace Bomb:SpaceRight Shift

Modes:

  • Multiplayer - Play against your friends online or in person
  • Tower Mode - Find hidden doors to climb the ever shrinking tower
  • Time Attack - Remove all obstacles on stage as quick as you can

Online Info:

  • Select the region best for you
  • Input your username
  • Enter your friend's lobby name, or create and share your own
  • Lobby names are case sensitive

Browser Info:

  • If your game is slow or lagging, turn on hardware acceleration in your browser's settings
  • Or download the desktop version

Socials:

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/GummyBear772 

Music Credits:

  • Cody O’Quinn - https://www.youtube.com/c/CodyO’Quinn
  • Free Music - https://www.youtube.com/c/FreeMusicc
